title: Couples Therapy
description: Romantic, revealing, and sometimes dangerous. Play 1-on-1 to deepen the bond or break the ice.

cards.content: Truth: What was your very first impression of me, honestly?
cards.back: Dare: Stare into my eyes for 60 seconds without laughing or talking.

cards.content: Truth: What is one habit of mine that secretly annoys you?
cards.back: Dare: Give me a foot massage for 2 minutes.

cards.content: Truth: When was the exact moment you knew you liked/loved me?
cards.back: Dare: Slow dance with me to no music for one minute.

cards.content: Truth: What is your biggest fear regarding our relationship?
cards.back: Dare: Unlock your phone and place it on the table for the next 2 rounds.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever kept a secret from me to protect my feelings?
cards.back: Dare: Let me look through your 'Recently Deleted' photos.

cards.content: Truth: What is one thing you wish I would do more often in bed?
cards.back: Dare: Kiss me somewhere you have never kissed me before.

cards.content: Truth: Who is the one person in my life you actually can't stand?
cards.back: Dare: Whisper a genuine compliment into my ear.

cards.content: Truth: If we broke up tomorrow, what would you miss the most?
cards.back: Dare: Let me sit on your lap for the next 3 rounds.

cards.content: Truth: What is the most attractive physical feature I possess?
cards.back: Dare: Take off my socks with your teeth.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever successfully lied to me?
cards.back: Dare: Show me the last DM you sent to a friend.

cards.content: Truth: What is a fantasy you have about us that you've never shared?
cards.back: Dare: Blindfold yourself and let me feed you a mystery snack.

cards.content: Truth: Do you think you are the 'reach' or the 'settler' in this relationship?
cards.back: Dare: Post a photo of us on your Story right now with a heart caption.

cards.content: Truth: What is the biggest argument we've had that you still think about?
cards.back: Dare: Re-enact our first kiss as accurately as possible.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever been jealous of one of my friends?
cards.back: Dare: Let me write a temporary tattoo on your arm with a pen.

cards.content: Truth: What is the most expensive gift you've bought me that you regret?
cards.back: Dare: Let me tickle you for 30 seconds without you defending yourself.

cards.content: Truth: On a scale of 1-10, how good of a kisser am I?
cards.back: Dare: French kiss me for exactly 20 seconds.

cards.content: Truth: What is one thing I do that makes you feel insecure?
cards.back: Dare: Tell me three things you love about my body.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever looked through my phone without asking?
cards.back: Dare: Hand me your phone and let me search one keyword in your messages.

cards.content: Truth: What is your favorite memory of us?
cards.back: Dare: Give me a piggyback ride around the room.

cards.content: Truth: Do you think we spend too much or too little time together?
cards.back: Dare: Plan a surprise date for us out loud right now.

cards.content: Truth: What is the most embarrassing thing I have ever done in public?
cards.back: Dare: Imitate my angry face.

cards.content: Truth: If you could change one physical thing about me, what would it be?
cards.back: Dare: Let me style your hair however I want.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever thought about breaking up with me?
cards.back: Dare: Hold my hand and don't let go until your next turn.

cards.content: Truth: What is the best date we have ever been on?
cards.back: Dare: Feed me a piece of fruit/food using only your mouth.

cards.content: Truth: Who do you think wears the pants in our relationship?
cards.back: Dare: Do 10 pushups with me lying on your back.

cards.content: Truth: What is something I am terrible at but think I am good at?
cards.back: Dare: Let me check your browser history from today.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever flirted with someone else while we were together?
cards.back: Dare: Send a heart emoji to my mother (or best friend).

cards.content: Truth: What is your favorite piece of clothing that I wear?
cards.back: Dare: Swap shirts with me for the rest of the game.

cards.content: Truth: Do you think my parents like you?
cards.back: Dare: Call your parents and tell them how great I am.

cards.content: Truth: What is the grossest thing I do in private?
cards.back: Dare: Smell my armpit (I promise it's fine... maybe).

cards.content: Truth: If we got married tomorrow, what would be your biggest hesitation?
cards.back: Dare: Propose to me with a ring made of paper/foil.

cards.content: Truth: What is the most romantic thing I have ever done for you?
cards.back: Dare: Write a love poem in 1 minute and read it to me.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever stayed in this relationship out of pity or habit?
cards.back: Dare: Look at me and say 'I love you' in three different accents.

cards.content: Truth: What is one thing you wish we had in common?
cards.back: Dare: Let me pick your profile picture on social media for 24 hours.

cards.content: Truth: Who is your 'Hall Pass' celebrity?
cards.back: Dare: Roleplay as that celebrity for 1 minute.

cards.content: Truth: What is a recurring dream you have about me?
cards.back: Dare: Draw a portrait of me on paper (or a napkin) in 30 seconds.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever lied about liking a gift I gave you?
cards.back: Dare: Wear my underwear over your pants for one round.

cards.content: Truth: What is the pettiest reason you have been mad at me?
cards.back: Dare: Apologize for something you didn't do.

cards.content: Truth: Do you think I am a good listener?
cards.back: Dare: I will whisper a sentence; you have to lip-read it.

cards.content: Truth: What is the closest we have come to breaking up?
cards.back: Dare: Hug me and whisper your biggest regret into my ear.

cards.content: Truth: If you could erase one of my exes from history, who would it be?
cards.back: Dare: Let me look at your Instagram 'Search' history.

cards.content: Truth: What is something you've learned from me?
cards.back: Dare: Teach me a dance move and I have to perform it.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever faked being happy for me?
cards.back: Dare: Laugh hysterically for 10 seconds without stopping.

cards.content: Truth: What is one sexual act you want to try but are afraid to ask?
cards.back: Dare: Demonstrate your favorite sleeping position on the floor.

cards.content: Truth: Do you think we handle money well as a couple?
cards.back: Dare: Show me your bank account balance.

cards.content: Truth: What is the most annoying sound I make?
cards.back: Dare: Record a voice memo of you making that sound and save it.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever trash-talked me to your friends?
cards.back: Dare: Text your best friend 'I am so lucky to have [Partner's Name]'.

cards.content: Truth: What is your favorite time of day to be with me?
cards.back: Dare: Cuddle with me in a position I choose for 1 minute.

cards.content: Truth: Do you think I spend too much time on my phone?
cards.back: Dare: Put both our phones in the freezer for 5 minutes.

cards.content: Truth: What is one thing you would change about my style?
cards.back: Dare: Pick out an outfit for me to wear tomorrow.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever doubted if I was 'The One'?
cards.back: Dare: Kiss my forehead, then my nose, then my lips.

cards.content: Truth: What is the most childish thing I do?
cards.back: Dare: Talk in a baby voice until your next turn.

cards.content: Truth: If we could move anywhere in the world, where would you take me?
cards.back: Dare: Describe your dream house in detail.

cards.content: Truth: What is a song that reminds you of me?
cards.back: Dare: Sing the chorus of that song to me.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever felt lonely while we were in the same room?
cards.back: Dare: Sit back-to-back and talk about our future.

cards.content: Truth: What is something I do that turns you on instantly?
cards.back: Dare: Bite your lip and look at me seductively.

cards.content: Truth: What is the biggest sacrifice you've made for this relationship?
cards.back: Dare: Bow down and kiss my hand.

cards.content: Truth: Do you think I am too critical of you?
cards.back: Dare: Let me give you a unibrow with a makeup pencil.

cards.content: Truth: What is one goal you want us to achieve this year?
cards.back: Dare: Do a 'trust fall' (I catch you).

cards.content: Truth: Why do you love me?
cards.back: Dare: Shout 'I AM IN LOVE!' out the window.
